productTitle: Hapinest Learn to Knit Hat and Scarf Knitting Loom Kit for Kids Ages 8-12
title: Great for beginners, kids and adults alike!
text: I loved this for myself and for my daughter. It has taught us how to make beanies and scarves and it's a great activity for kids to teach them to use their hands to make things. After using up the yarn provided I bought more at Michael's so I've been able to make more things with it! Very much enjoyable and has everything you need to start right away!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2025

productTitle: Hapinest Learn to Knit Hat and Scarf Knitting Loom Kit for Kids Ages 8-12
title: Quality Loom/ Excellent Product/ Buy it!!!
text: 3 hats were made AND 1 infinity scarf!!!! Easy to follow directions! Bought this for a a Christmas gift for a 12 year old. Highly recommend this product! Will be buying more things from this company due to the quality of products in this lovely kit! Thank you for selling an excellent kit!

productTitle: Hapinest Learn to Knit Hat and Scarf Knitting Loom Kit for Kids Ages 8-12
title: Way too small when finished

productTitle: Hapinest Learn to Knit Hat and Scarf Knitting Loom Kit for Kids Ages 8-12
title: Daughter got the hang of it after a few rounds
text: Got this for my daughter (9). Written instructions are pretty straightforward. The diagrams could be a little clearer. I crochet so it made sense to me, but if have no experience with crochet or knitting, it might be tricky to decipher the images.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2025
